name: @syu93/lit-router
description: LitRouter** is a simple client side router, component loader (see [PRPL](https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/performance/prpl-pattern/)) based on [page.js](https://github.com/visionmedia/page.js). It's designed to work well with [**Web Components**](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Web_Components) and [**LitElement**](https://lit-element.polymer-project.org).
author: syu93
